main event: Police Chief and his group observed a UFO for 15 minutes on January 2nd, 1965, but lost sight of it when they attempted to obtain binoculars.
interesting points: UFO observed had a silvery, metallic exterior and lights around the edge., The sighting took place at 4:30 p.m., The police chief and his group tried to get binoculars for a closer look., The UFO moved away before they could use binoculars., They were unable to provide further details as the object disappeared.
sighted object: UFO with a silvery metallic exterior and lights
witness description: Police Chief and three other men
